summary: The government's security clearance process can help protect classified information. But due to concerns with timeliness, IT security, and more, we added this vetting process to our High Risk List in 2018. The government has made progress on vetting reforms. For example, the executive branch has reduced the investigations backlog and started developing IT systems to modernize the vetting process. However, work remains. For example...
title: Personnel Vetting: Actions Needed to Implement Reforms, Address Challenges, and Improve Planning
